title: Would you like to WALK without holding down a key by using Caps Lock?
body:
> by 0x66569a1bb95d6cd17aa8b974ba2e7506c6fbdb47 (Whystler#db47)

I suggest that Caps Lock be used to make walking "sticky".  If you like to walk around instead of run, that would allow you to do so without having to constantly hold down the Shift key.

- Yes - caps lock walk please.
- No - i like constantly holding down the shift key


**[Vote on this proposal on the Decentraland DAO](https://governance.decentraland.org/en/proposal/?id=b0ab8fb0-d9ba-11eb-9110-69b867ba991b)**
choices: No - i like constantly holding down the shift key
author: 0x5E23D08324f017d5425e59A2782C9ae27aCE0958
